name: Early Judgment
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Inner Sea Gods © 2014, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: Depending on the creature's alignment and its adherence to its ethos, you can provide it a brief glimpse of the reward or punishment that waits for it when it dies by showing it a mental image of its destined plane in the afterlife. If the target is good-aligned, it is fascinated for 1d4 rounds on a failed save. If the target is neutral-aligned, it is confused for 1d4 rounds on a failed save. If the target is evil-aligned, it is shaken for 1d4 rounds on a failed save.
text_zh: 你让目标生物得以一窥他死后的归宿——他的灵魂在法莱斯玛的法庭上接受审判后发往的最终命运。基于这个法术的受术者阵营和他的道德观念，他会目睹自己在死去之后将在多元宇宙中属于他的那个阵营界域接受折磨或获得奖励的情景。如果在豁免检定中失败，且目标的阵营为善良，这个法术将使他迷魂1d4轮；如果目标的阵营为中立，这个法术将使他困惑1d4轮；如果目标的阵营为邪恶，这个法术将使他战栗1d4轮。
